plot: A girl is reading the newspaper in a park. Wars, murder... only bad news. While she's thinking that the world is in a bad condition, she's realizing that everything is going backwards ...
title: (R)évolutions
plot_es: A girl is reading the newspaper in a park. Wars, murder... only bad news. While she's thinking that the world is in a bad condition, she's realizing that everything is going backwards ...
plot_en: A girl is reading the newspaper in a park. Wars, murder... only bad news. While she's thinking that the world is in a bad condition, she's realizing that everything is going backwards ...

cast.role: The guy jumping up to the fence
cast.name: Olivier Blondeau
